scripts.run-all-local-installs: cd apps/cms && npm install && cd ../api && npm install && cd ../../packages/database && npm install
scripts.cms: cd apps/cms && node -e require('fs-extra').remove('.next') && turbo run dev
scripts.api: cd apps/api && npm run build && turbo run dev
scripts.db-reset: cd packages/database && tsx reset-db.ts && npx drizzle-kit drop && npx drizzle-kit generate && npx drizzle-kit migrate && npx drizzle-kit push && npm run build && tsx seed.ts && echo All done!
scripts.delete-node-modules: node -e require('fs-extra').remove('node_modules') && cd apps/cms && node -e require('fs-extra').remove('node_modules') && cd ../api && node -e require('fs-extra').remove('node_modules') && cd ../../packages/database && node -e require('fs-extra').remove('node_modules')
scripts.delete-all-builds: cd apps/api && node -e require('fs-extra').remove('dist') && cd ../cms && node -e require('fs-extra').remove('.next') && cd ../../packages/database && node -e require('fs-extra').remove('dist')
